title: Screen resolution shrinking after a game is over

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hey forum,

Posted this to the LoL subreddit with no replies, so I thought I'd try here.

For about two weeks now, every other game, my screen's resolution will shrink from 2560x1440 to 1024x768 when the game is over and you are redirected back to the client.

I'm unable to go into the start menu or change the resolution back from accessing the screen resolution settings from the desktop.
The only way I can get my normal display back is by alt+f4 restarting my computer or, if my screen just stays black and doesn't go through with the shrinking like itâ€™s started to do today, holding the power button until my computer shuts off.

Anyone else have this issue? Anyone have a hotfix? It's really annoying having to restart my computer after a game of league, so any help I could get would be great.

replies.body:
Your game configuration file may be having problems with your PC settings.  We may be able to quick fix this by resetting your config files:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if that helps!

After doing as you instructed, the issue persists. It's pretty infuriating because it closes all applications, not just League. So any Skype calls or music app I have in the background instantly gets shut down and I'm forced to hard restart.

Thanks for this update!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into your specific issue.  I also recommend grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and downloading a set of logs, then attach it to your ticket for context.  We'll respond asap!
